text.section: An individual tax preparer shall maintain for a length of time specified by the Board that is not more stringent than a length of time specified under federal law all records of personal income tax returns prepared by the individual tax preparer.

section.section:
A disclosure required under this subsection shall be provided to a customer:
at an initial meeting between the individual tax preparer and the customer; and
if the individual tax preparer maintains a website, on the website.
